trans-unit.source: Provides information and event data that is associated with the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供與 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter" /> 事件相關聯的資訊與事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`listingDataView`的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作範例`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`篩選事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來篩選掉`AuctionItem`物件`CurrentPrice`$25.00 或更高。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the item passes the filter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出項目是否通過篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item passes the filter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目通過篩選條件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`listingDataView`的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作範例`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`篩選事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來篩選掉`AuctionItem`物件`CurrentPrice`$25.00 或更高。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that the filter should test.
trans-unit.target: 取得篩選條件應該測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object that the filter should test.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件應該測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`listingDataView`的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範實作範例`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`篩選事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來篩選掉`AuctionItem`物件`CurrentPrice`$25.00 或更高。
